page.title: 13Family Life by an 8yr.old
page.content: My mum has a very hard life. She has to get the food and clean the house. She goes down to Denby Dale pays the rent for the video and gets the groceries. She goes out at night and helps at school. On Saturday she helps me and my dad in the garden. Mum helps my sister to read and teaches me sums that I have trouble with. My Dad goes round the world on business. When he's at home he takes us out shopping. Dad teaches me to sail. My sister and I go to the same school. I help her with things that are hard. My sister is five and I'm eight.
